title: Mackenzie 6-Piece Motion Sectional Chestnut
description: This stunning, six-piece sectional is perfect for everything from casual lounging to entertaining guests. It's conveniently built with a modular design to fit with any living space. Upholstered in a smooth, breathable PU match, it offers endless hours of comfort. Polyester-filled lumbar support takes relaxation to the next level. The rich chestnut color of its fabric is elegantly enhanced by contrast baseball stitching for a chic, elegant look.

title: Longport 3-piece Upholstered Power Living Room Set Dark Brown
description: Complete a casual entertainment area with this sectional set. Wrapped in a smooth and supple top grain leather, these power-operated pieces offer comfortable seating for up to five people. In addition, wall hugging recliners that allow you to kick back and relax for a midday nap or an epic movie series. Modern touches, such as USB charging ports and a power outlet offer a way to keep personal handheld devices and gaming controls good and charged. Plus, each reclining piece offers long-lasting, supportive pocket coil seating, along with relaxing, cool gel memory foam toppers.

title: Jennings 3-piece Motion Living Room Set Charcoal
description: Make any entertainment space for functional and stylish with this set. Made from chenille fabric, it's bound to bring a sense of comfort to your space. The coziness factor is amplified with its padded backrest and armrests. The loveseat provides cup holders for your favorite beverages. Manual reclining mechanism provides the ultimate comfort experience.

title: Lennox 3-piece Track Arm Upholstered Living Room Set Charcoal
description: With a clean silhouette and a Mid-century modern flair, this three-piece living room set includes a matching sofa, loveseat, and armchair.Each piece boasts sleek, thin track arms and grid style tufting on the bench cushion.Wrapped in a charcoal faux linen fabric, this set invites you to sit back and relax.Tapered black plastic legs add support and contrast.In addition, the sofa and loveseat come with matching round bolster pillows in the same soft charcoal fabric.

title: Jennings 2-piece Motion Living Room Set Brown
description: Make any entertainment space for functional and stylish with this set. Made from chenille fabric, it's bound to bring a sense of comfort to your space. The coziness factor is amplified with its padded backrest and armrests. The loveseat provides cup holders for your favorite beverages. Manual reclining mechanism provides the ultimate comfort experience.

title: Lennox 2-piece Track Arm Upholstered Living Room Set Charcoal
description: Sleek with a Mid-century modern flair, this two-piece living room set includes a matching sofa and loveseat.A clean silhouette, each seat features thin track arms and grid style tufting on the bench cushion.Wrapped in a charcoal linen-like upholstery, this set invites you to sit back and relax.Tapered black plastic legs add support and contrast.In addition, the sofa and loveseat come with matching round bolster pillows in the same soft charcoal fabric.

title: Longport 3-piece Upholstered Power Living Room Set Charcoal
description: Complete a casual entertainment area with this sectional set. title: Kester 2-piece Recessed Track Arm Living Room Set Charcoal
description: With a utilitarian look, this two-piece living room set includes a sofa and loveseat combo. Wrapped in a soft linen-like upholstery, each furniture piece features shelter style track arms along with boxed T-cushion seats that invite you to relax. Lifted by weathered white wood bases with sleek black metal feet, this living room duo creates a more industrial design aesthetic. Available in multiple colors, this set can be placed into your home's current color palette quite easily. Place it in a loft studio apartment for a fun, casual look.

title: Longport 2-piece Upholstered Power Living Room Set Charcoal
description: Complete a casual entertainment area with this sectional set. Wrapped in a smooth and supple top grain leather, these power-operated pieces offer comfortable seating for up to five people. title: Leaton 2-piece Recessed Arms Living Room Set Brown Sugar
description: Wrapped in a smooth mottled top grain leather in a warm brown sugar hue, this seating set lends a neutral tone that complements a living room's existing color palettes. Perfectly suited for a modern farmhouse home, this seating set offers many transitional elements such as sleek recessed arms that gently slope off toward the front. Along each arm interior facade and backrest are individually hammered nailheads in an antique brass finish. Plush back cushions and tailored boxed seats offer long-lasting support and comfort for family and guests. In addition, matching welt trim lines each cushion, adding a classic look.

title: Kester 3-piece Recessed Track Arm Living Room Set Charcoal
description: With an industrial flair, this three-piece living room set includes a sofa, loveseat, and armchair to complete an entire seating area.Wrapped in a faux linen upholstery, each piece features shelter style track arms along with boxed T-cushion seats.Supported by a weathered white wood base with sleek black metal feet, this living room set creates a transitional, tailored design aesthetic.Available in multiple colors, this set can be placed into your home's existing color palette.Place it in a loft studio apartment of beachside bungalow for a contemporary flair.

title: Holman 3-piece Pillow Top Arm Living Room Set Beige
description: Relax and enjoy when you sit back in this contemporary three-piece living room set.Included is a sofa, loveseat, and armchair, each featuring plush high back headrests and pillow top armrests.This set lures you into it with a soft, beige velvet upholstery that works wonderfully with existing color palettes.It's tapered block feet in a contrasting brown finish add support for all your friends and family.In addition, this set has features pillow top arm for an ultra-cozy feel.

title: Jennings 3-piece Power Living Room Set Brown
description: Your home entertainment space becomes comfortable and stylish with this set. Made from chenille fabric, it's bound to bring a sense of comfort to your space. Memory foam cushioning provides exceptionally comfortable seating. Meanwhile, the sofa and loveseat provide built-in cup holders to have beverages on hand. Enhance modern living spaces, dens, and more with this spectacular set.

title: Higgins Four-Piece Upholstered Power Sectional Tan
description: With chic style and exquisite comfort, this four-piece sectional is a fabulous addition to any living room. With its large size, it comfortably seats up to six. Its smooth, tan upholstery has a pleasingly soft texture. Its reclining seats offer cozy support and restful relaxation. This sectional creates an inviting gathering space for your guests to enjoy.
